title: U. S. Geological Survey Bulletin
aka: Bulletin of the United States Geological Survey
additional-notes: This is a US government publication.

This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for renewals for an issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
